#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int scan()    {int ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0,flag=1;for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked())if(ip=='-'){flag=-1;ip=getchar_unlocked();break;}for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())ret=ret*10+ip-'0';return flag*ret;}
void print(int n)     {int i=10;char output_buffer[11];output_buffer[10]='\n';do{output_buffer[--i]=(n%10)+'0';n/=10;}while(n);do{putchar_unlocked(output_buffer[i]);}while(++i<11);}
int start;
int josephus(int n , int k)
{
	if(n==1) return 1;
	else return (josephus(n-1,k+start)+k-1)%n + 1 ;
}
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    t=scan();
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,m;
		n=scan();m=scan();
		start=m;
		print(josephus(n,m));
	}
	return 0;
}
